title: My Past Life Enemy Was My Father?
alternative_title: My Enemy in My Past Life Was My Father? ; My Father Is the Enemy of My Past Life? ; Your Enemy in Your Past Life Was Your Dad? ; Your Enemy in Your Past Life Was Your Father? ; 전생의 원수가 아빠라고요? ; 上辈子的仇人是我爸？
status: My Enemy in My Past Life Was My Father? ; My Father Is the Enemy of My Past Life? ; Your Enemy in Your Past Life Was Your Dad? ; Your Enemy in Your Past Life Was Your Father? ; 전생의 원수가 아빠라고요? ; 上辈子的仇人是我爸？
description:
Description :
        I lived to the age of 19, only to be constantly taken advantage of by fake family members. With the vow to seek revenge still fresh in my mind, I made the choice to live my life again.

Yet why have I returned to the night I was kidnapped from a burning castle?

"Hwelp me! Hwelp me! The willian ish twaking Maedie!"

My savior ended up being the enemy's son?! For days and nights I followed him to the enemy's castle, but upon arrival, a warm welcome...

"Ack! Father! Second Brother's picked up another living thing!"

...wasn't what awaited me.
